title: Shattering the Ice
description: Charity Drake has only known heartache, until she had her son, Ethan. Now, everything revolves around him, and she wouldn’t have it any other way.Marc Kane, the goalie for the Chicago Eagles, has dated a few girls, but wants that one true love, and he thinks he found it. The problem is, Charity isn’t sure she’s ready.Through ups and downs, and Ethan’s love, Marc and Charity try to figure out if their shattered past can be put together?
author: Mary     Smith
